thread.title: should be exempt from proposed U.S. tariffs: economy minister

author: Reuters Editorial
title: should be exempt from proposed U.S. tariffs: economy minister
text:
MEXICO CITY (Reuters) - Mexico’s economy minister said on Monday that the country should be exempt from proposed U.S. tariffs on steel and aluminum as the latest round of talks to modernize the North American Free Trade Agreement draws to a close.
FILE PHOTO: Mexico's Economy Minister Ildefonso Guajardo speaks during an entrepreneurship event in Mexico City, Mexico February 21, 2018. REUTERS/Ginnette Riquelme Economy Minister Ildefonso Guajardo wrote in a post on Twitter that the tariffs are“the wrong way to incentivize the creation of a new & modern #NAFTA.”
Reporting by Sharay Angulo and Julia Love; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama
